content.question: Which of the following statements is true about function <math alttext="K"> <mi>K</mi> </math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="K"><mi>K</mi></math> models electricity usage as a function of time.
<math alttext="K"><mi>K</mi></math> models temperature as a function of electricity usage.
<math alttext="K"><mi>K</mi></math> models time as a function of electricity usage.
<math alttext="K"><mi>K</mi></math> models electricity usage as a function of temperature.

content.answer: <math alttext="K"><mi>K</mi></math> models electricity usage as a function of time.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe the characteristics of a function with varying levels of precision, depending on the function representation and available mathematical tools.
